TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SqlError extends System.Object

summary.span: 收集與 SQL Server 所傳回之警告或錯誤相關的資訊。

span.span: Collects information relevant to a warning or error returned by SQL Server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會建立.NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server 發生錯誤時。This class is created by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server when an error occurs. 執行個體會建立和管理，這又由類別。An instance of is created and managed by the , which in turn is created by the class. 安全性層級 10 或以下的訊息是告知性的訊息，用以指出問題產生的原因是使用者輸入了錯誤的資訊。Messages with a severity level of 10 or less are informational and indicate problems caused by mistakes in information that a user has entered. 嚴重性層級 11 至 16 由使用者產生，並且可以由使用者更正。Severity levels from 11 through 16 are generated by the user, and can be corrected by the user. 17 到 25 的嚴重性層級表示軟體或硬體錯誤。Severity levels from 17 through 25 indicate software or hardware errors. 當層級 17 時、 18 或 19 的錯誤會發生，您可以繼續工作，但您可能無法執行特定陳述式。When a level 17, 18, or 19 error occurs, you can continue working, although you might not be able to execute a particular statement. 當嚴重性層級為 19 或低於 19 時， 仍保持開啟。The remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 發生 20 或以上的安全性層級時，伺服器通常會關閉 。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server usually closes the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 在這兩個情況中， 皆由執行該命令的方法所產生。In both cases, a is generated by the method executing the command. 如需詳細資訊，所產生之錯誤[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]，請參閱[原因和 Database Engine 錯誤解析](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms365262.aspx)。For more information on errors generated by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)], see [Cause and Resolution of Database Engine Errors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms365262.aspx). 如需有關嚴重性層級的詳細資訊，請參閱[Database Engine 錯誤嚴重性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms164086.aspx)。For more information about severity levels, see [Database Engine Error Severities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms164086.aspx). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public byte Class { get; }
.property instance unsigned int8 Class
Public ReadOnly Property Class As Byte
public: property System::Byte Class { System::Byte get(); };

summary.span: 取得從 SQL Server 傳回之錯誤的嚴重性層級。

span.span: Gets the severity level of the error returned from SQL Server.

value.span: 從 1 到 25 的值，表示錯誤的嚴重性層級。

span.span: A value from 1 to 25 that indicates the severity level of the error.
The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全性層級 10 或以下的訊息是告知性的訊息，用以指出問題產生的原因是使用者輸入了錯誤的資訊。Messages with a severity level of 10 or less are informational and indicate problems caused by mistakes in information that a user has entered. 嚴重性層級 11 至 16 由使用者產生，並且可以由使用者更正。Severity levels from 11 through 16 are generated by the user, and can be corrected by the user. 17 到 25 的嚴重性層級表示軟體或硬體錯誤。Severity levels from 17 through 25 indicate software or hardware errors. 當層級 17 時、 18 或 19 的錯誤會發生，您可以繼續工作，但您可能無法執行特定陳述式。When a level 17, 18, or 19 error occurs, you can continue working, although you might not be able to execute a particular statement. 當嚴重性層級為 19 或低於 19 時， 仍保持開啟。The remains open when the severity level is 19 or less. 發生 20 或以上的安全性層級時，伺服器通常會關閉 。When the severity level is 20 or greater, the server usually closes the . 但是，使用者可以再次開啟連線，然後繼續進行。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 在這兩個情況中， 皆由執行該命令的方法所產生。In both cases, a is generated by the method executing the command. 如需 SQL 伺服器所產生之錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public int LineNumber { get; }
.property instance int32 LineNumber
Public ReadOnly Property LineNumber As Integer
public: property int LineNumber { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含錯誤之 Transact-SQL 命令批次或預存程序內的行號。

span.span: Gets the line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.

value.span: 包含錯誤之 Transact-SQL 命令批次或預存程序內的行號。

span.span: The line number within the Transact-SQL command batch or stored procedure that contains the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 顯示行號從 1 開始。Line numbering starts at 1. 如果值為 0，行號不適用。If the value is 0, the line number is not applicable. 如需 SQL 伺服器所產生之錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. Public ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

span.span: Gets the text describing the error.
The text describing the error.

value.span: 如需 SQL 伺服器所產生之錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》。

span.span: For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online.

.property instance int32 Number
Public ReadOnly Property Number As Integer
public: property int Number { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得識別錯誤類型的值。

span.span: Gets a number that identifies the type of error.
The number that identifies the type of error.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表描述此屬性的可能值：The following table describes the possible values for this property: |錯誤的來源Source of Error|SqlError.NumberSqlError.Number|SqlError.StateSqlError.State|SqlException 具有內部 Win32Exception （開始以 Framework 4.5）SqlException has inner Win32Exception (beginning with.NET Framework 4.5)| |---------------------|---------------------|--------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |伺服器錯誤Error from server|伺服器錯誤程式碼Server error code

此數字對應中的項目`master.dbo.sysmessages`資料表。This number corresponds to an entry in the `master.dbo.sysmessages` table.|通常大於 0Typically greater than 0|否No| |連接逾時Connection timeout|-2-2|00|是 (編號 = 258)Yes (Number = 258)| |通訊錯誤 (非 LocalDB)Communication error (non-LocalDB)|Win32 錯誤碼Win32 error code|00|是 (編號 = Win32 錯誤碼)Yes (Number = Win32 error code)| |通訊錯誤 (LocalDB)Communication error (LocalDB)|Win32 錯誤碼Win32 error code|00|否No| |加密功能不相符Encryption capability mismatch|2020|00|否No| |無法啟動 LocalDBFailed to start LocalDB|Win32 錯誤碼Win32 error code|00|否No| |唯讀路由失敗Read-only routing failure|00|00|否No| |Server 有嚴重的錯誤處理查詢Server had severe error processing query|00|00|否No| |剖析結果時的處理取消作業Processed cancellation while parsing results|00|00|否No| |無法建立使用者執行個體Failed to create user instance|00|00|否No| 如需 SQL 伺服器所產生之錯誤的詳細資訊，請參閱《SQL Server 線上叢書》。For more information on errors generated by SQL Server, see SQL Server Books Online. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 某些錯誤訊息可能會在資料庫引擎程式碼中的多個點上引發。

span.span: Some error messages can be raised at multiple points in the code for the Database Engine.

summary.span: 例如，1105 錯誤可能會因為許多不同情況而引發。

span.span: For example, an 1105 error can be raised for several different conditions.

summary.span: 每個引發錯誤的特定條件會指派唯一的狀態碼。

span.span: Each specific condition that raises an error assigns a unique state code.
The state code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 狀態才會設定為會從伺服器收到的錯誤。State is only set for errors that are received from the server. 如需詳細資訊，所產生之錯誤[!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)]，請參閱[了解 Database Engine 錯誤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms165761.aspx)。For more information on errors generated by [!INCLUDE[ssNoVersion](~/includes/ssnoversion-md.md)], see [Understanding Database Engine Errors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms165761.aspx). ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError.State Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError.State Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToString () As String
public: override System::String ^ ToString();

summary.span: 取得錯誤訊息的完整文字。

span.span: Gets the complete text of the error message.
The complete text of the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字串的格式為"SqlError:"，後面接著，和堆疊追蹤。The string is in the form "SqlError:", followed by the , and the stack trace. 例如: For example: SqlError:UserId 或密碼無效。SqlError:UserId or Password not valid. \<堆疊追蹤 >\ ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每內集合。The following example displays each within the collection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlError Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlError Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
